channel.title: Automation on Curious Joe
channel.description: Recent content in Automation on Curious Joe

item.title: Automate Your Repetitive Reports!
item.description: What is R script automation and why? In most use cases R is used to analyze data, run statistical tests and build model. In doing so, data scientists constantly interact with R by writing codes and produce results from these interactions. Eventually, these results are stored, shared or presented as a report. But what if you have to reproduce the report every day or in other type of regular interval?
